attributes.action: Take Question Time off the air.
attributes.additional_details:
Question Time in my view is past its sell by date.

It is merely an intellectual sounding board for the panel, while the odd sheep gets to say something that might be worthwhile. Dimbleby controls the audience like a public school teacher. While the French, German's and Greeks, bring their country's to a standstill if their Government’s try to change things.

We've had the same free market system for so many years, since the 80's, the general public know no different, even the positives of Europe are kept from us due to the right wing press and right wing biased BBC news.

There is no longer any working class solidarity in Britain.

We want Question Time to be taken off the air.  Or privatised.
